translation.en: Noodles?

translation.en: Hey, Lulu!

translation.en: ♪ Try an apple, try a pear Roots and veggies everywhere ♪

translation.en: ♪ Try some peas, try a carrot It's so good, I'd love to share it ♪

translation.en: ♪ Green beans or some rice Cucumber, that would be nice ♪
